vulnerabilities.description: The components wfshbr64.sys and wfshbr32.sys in Another Eden before v3.0.20 and before v2.14.200 allows attackers to perform privilege escalation via a crafted payload.
wfshbr64.sys and wfshbr32.sys specially crafted IOCTL allows arbitrary user to perform local privilege escalation
In Valve Steam 1528829181 BETA, it is possible to perform a homograph / homoglyph attack to create fake URLs in the client, which may trick users into visiting unintended web sites.
